import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import speakerImage from "../img/O-M.jpg"; // Import the speaker image using the relative path import "./HeroMain.css"; // Import the CSS file for the Hero component export default function HeroMain() { const [showWebinar, setShowWebinar] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { const timer = setTimeout(() => { setShowWebinar(true); }, 1000); // Delay of 1 second before showing "WEBINAR" return () => clearTimeout(timer); }, []); return (
{/* Dark Overlay for Readability */}
{/* Content Section */}
{/* Left Content - Main Title and Buttons */}

UPCOMING{" "} {showWebinar && WEBINAR}

{/* Right Content - Webinar Info Card */}

HPC in Morocco - A Look at the Marwan Supercomputing Center

Ouail El Maadi

Computer Science Student, Al Akhawayn University
Ifrane, Morocco

September 27th, 2024

20H RABAT

); }
